result.name: YouTube Fullscreen Stream w/ Twitch-style Chat
result.description: Prefer the look of Twitch chat? YouTube's chat room design leaves a lot to be desired, but this code allows for a more enjoyable experience. Watching on the big screen? Press F11 to enjoy the fullscreen goodness of YouTube live streams with chat room. BTTV emotes on YouTube? Now supported, download from: https://betterttv.com/ & https://7tv.app/
result.notes: • Twitch Style: Resembles the Twitch website and allows you to see more of the chat. • Chat Room Font Size: Choose between the original or a larger size. • Chat Room Profile Images: Reduce the size of profile images, or hide them altogether. • Chat Room Author Colour: Select a colour to be used for default chat room usernames. • Darker Theme: Enable an even darker theme. YouTube Dark theme needs to be enabled alongside this setting. • Quality Menu Scroll Fix: Attempts to display all resolution quality settings on screen without the need for scrolling. • 7TV Emote Fix: Attempts to realign 7TV and YouTube emotes that are incorrectly displayed. • Fullscreen Style: Select style to be used in F11 full screen mode. • Fullscreen Mode: Select how viewer and like/dislike information is displayed. • Progress Bar Colour: Colour used for progress bar and other buttons. • Remove AM/PM: Hides AM/PM from timestamp. • Ultrawide: Enable support for 21:9 monitors.
